name: Dash till Puff!
description:
Fly, bounce, dive and dash your way through geometry!

Are you ready for the challenge? Test your skills on this almost impossible game!

Game Features:
• 8 Unique endless procedurally-generated worlds
• Unlock avatars, colors and trails to customize your character!
• Challenge your friends with Game Center Leaderboards!
• One-touch responsive controls
• No Wifi or Internet connection? Don't worry, you can play offline!
• Full HD graphics
• Super-optimized performance
• Lots of achievements and secrets to reveal
• Checkpoint system to keep the challenge up
• Amazing music from top artists such as Waterflame, DJVI or Forever Bound
